description: Template structure for governance policies loaded by the Policy Governance Engine (PGE), referenced by STDM validation keys.

policy_template.policy_id: string: Must match RRP/RVP defined in STDM

execution_directives.directive_id: string: Unique ID for action set
execution_directives.action_type: enum: THROTTLE, RESTART, ISOLATE, NOTIFY, ESCALATE

fallback_mechanism.protocol_reference: string: Policy ID to execute if primary directives fail
